mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate, ipaddress from (select /*+INDEX_DESC(tbl_board pk_board) */ rownum rn, bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate, ipaddress from tbl_board where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board( bno ,title ,content ,writer ,ipaddress) values( seq_board.nextval ,#{title} ,#{content} ,#{writer} ,SYS_CONTEXT ('USERENV', 'IP_ADDRESS'))
